Key Match Events: Brennan Johnson scored his seventh goal in seven games before Harry Wilson doubled Wales’s lead
Logi Tómasson scored two goals in three second-half minutes to draw Iceland level
Danny Ward's 72nd-minute own goal gifted Iceland an equalizer
Post-Match Reflections: Bellamy expressed satisfaction despite the draw, emphasizing the need for improvement
Hareide praised Iceland's comeback and their performance in the second half
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wales started strongly, scoring twice in the first 30 minutes
Iceland showed resilience and nearly completed a comeback, with a shot hitting the post
Weather conditions were sub-zero, prompting some supporters to remove their clothing
